posts.title: Headless UI v2.1: Simplified transition API and improved multi-dialog support
posts.excerpt: We just released Headless UI v2.1 for React, which dramatically simplifies our transition APIs and adds support for rendering multiple dialogs as siblings.

posts.title: Automatically clean up whitespace and duplicate class names
posts.excerpt: We just released a new version of prettier-plugin-tailwindcss which adds support for removing unnecessary whitespace and duplicate classes when sorting.

posts.title: Catalyst: Application layouts, navigation menus, description lists, and more
posts.excerpt: We just published the first major update to Catalyst since releasing the development preview, with two new application layouts, navbar and sidebar components, description lists, and more.

posts.title: Headless UI v2.0 for React
posts.excerpt: Nothing beats actually building something real with your own tools when it comes to finding ways to make things better. As we've been working on Catalyst these last several months, we've been making dozens of improvements to Headless UI that let you write even less code, and make the developer experience even better.

posts.title: We're hiring a Design Engineer + Staff Engineer
posts.excerpt: We're hiring a Design Engineer and Staff Software Engineer to work on some ambitious new projects with us. Both roles are fully remote, with a salary of $275,000 USD.
